title: My lol launcher will not open! (Im on a mac and am NA)
body:
Ok so whenever I double click on my league of legends it simply bounces once and just does not open. I have no clue what to do and have tried quite a bit of methods which people claim to stop the problem. None of it worked. So I decided to reinstall league. This took a long time but then it worked again for about 2 days. Then I could not open it. I still cannot open the launcher. Please help me this is soooo frustrating. 


Info: I am a mac OS X El Capitan user (version: 10.11.6).
I am an NA user
If u need to ask anymore questions in order to help me ask them and ill answer.

Thanks in advance for all the help!

replies.body: I've seen this happen a lot if launching League from the Dock. Can you try launching League from the *Applications* folder instead? Let me know if this caused any change. ^.^

i havnt been able to login for a month now still no real help i use mac too i posted alot asking for help i did everything and still nothing i can play in Oceania but seems my Main Acc in NA is gone years of fun and time gone i asked if they could move my main account to Oceania still no reply...seems this issue has been around for awhile otheres were having it at same time as me
I just updated my mac to OS X El Capitan 10.11.6 and have the same problem...won't open LoL client
